name: John Tang
text: Well, if you're young, I'd recommend finding purpose in life; if you're over 35, I'd recommend bet at peace with what you have, unless that dream is to be a writer, engineer, or doctor.

source_obj.text: Well, if you're young, I'd recommend finding purpose in life; if you're over 35, I'd recommend bet at peace with what you have, unless that dream is to be a writer, engineer, or doctor.
